00011 
00012 NSString* md5(NSString *str) {
00013   const char *cStr = [str UTF8String];
00014   unsigned char result[CC_MD5_DIGEST_LENGTH];
00015   CC_MD5(cStr, strlen(cStr), result);
00016   return [NSString 
00017           stringWithFormat: @"%02X%02X%02X%02X%02X%02X%02X%02X%02X%02X%02X%02X%02X%02X%02X%02X",
00018           result[0], result[1], result[2], result[3], result[4], result[5], result[6], result[7],
00019           result[8], result[9], result[10], result[11], result[12], result[13], result[14], result[15]];
00020 }
00021 
00022 id _gatherResultsCallback(id results) {
00023   NSMutableArray *ret = [NSMutableArray array];
00024   for (int i = 0; i < [results count]; i++) {
00025     [ret addObject:[[results objectAtIndex:i] objectAtIndex:1]];
00026   }
00027   return ret;
00028 }

00052 + (DKDeferred *)deferred {
00053   return [[[self class] alloc] initWithCanceller:nil];

00056 + (id)succeed:(id)result {
00057   DKDeferred *d = [DKDeferred deferred];
00058   [d callback:result];
00059   return d;
00060 }
00061 
00062 + (id)fail:(id)result {
00063   DKDeferred *d = [DKDeferred deferred];
00064   [d errback:result];
00065   return d;
00066 }

00068 // used by +wait:value:
00069 + (id)_returnValueCallback:(id)value results:(id)results_ {
00070   return value;
00071 }
00072 
00073 + (id)wait:(NSTimeInterval)seconds value:(id)value {
00074   DKDeferred *d = [DKDeferred deferred];
00075   if (! (value == nil))
00076     [d addCallback:curryTS((id)self, @selector(_returnValueCallback:results:), value)];
00077   [d performSelector:@selector(callback:)
00078           withObject:[NSNull null] 
00079           afterDelay:seconds];
00080   return d;
00081 }
00082 
00083 // used by +callLater:func:
00084 + (id)_callLaterCallback:(id<DKCallback>)cb results:(id)results_ {
00085   return [cb :results_];
00086 }
00087 
00088 + (id)callLater:(NSTimeInterval)seconds func:(id<DKCallback>)func {
00089   
00090   return [[DKDeferred wait:seconds value:nil]
00091           addCallback:
00092            curryTS((id)self, @selector(_callLaterCallback:results:), [func retain])];
00093 }

00095 + (id)maybeDeferred:(id<DKCallback>)maybeDeferredf withObject:(id)anObject {
00096   id result;
00097   id r = [maybeDeferredf :anObject];
00098   if ([r isKindOfClass:[DKDeferred class]])
00099     result = r;
00100   else if ([r isKindOfClass:[NSError class]])
00101     result = [self fail:r];
00102   else
00103     result = [self succeed:r];
00104   return result;
00105 }

00111 + (id)defer:(id<DKCallback>)func withObject:(id)arg inQueue:(NSOperationQueue *)queue {

00113   [queue addOperation:[ret operation]];
00114   return ret;

00117 + (id)loadURL:(NSString *)aUrl cached:(BOOL)cached {
00118   return [self loadURL:aUrl cached:cached paused:NO];

00121 + (id)loadURL:(NSString *)aUrl cached:(BOOL)cached paused:(BOOL)_paused {
00122   id ret;
00123   if (cached) {
00124     ret = [[DKDeferredCache sharedCache] valueForKey:aUrl];
00125     if (_paused)
00126       ret = pauseDeferred(ret);
00127     [ret addBoth:curryTS((id)self, @selector(_cachedLoadURLCallback:results:), aUrl)];
00128   } else {
00129     ret = [self loadURL:aUrl paused:_paused];
00130   }
00131   return ret;
00132 }
00133 
00134 + (id)_uncachedURLLoadCallback:(NSString *)url results:(id)_results {
00135   if (isDeferred(_results))
00136     return [_results addBoth:curryTS((id)self, @selector(_uncachedURLLoadCallback:results:), url)];
00137   if (_results == [NSNull null]) {
00138     return [[DKDeferredURLConnection loadURL:url]
00139             addBoth:curryTS((id)self, @selector(_uncachedURLLoadCallback:results:), url)];
00140   } else {
00141     return _results;
00142   }
00143   return nil;
00144 }
00145 
00146 + (id)_cachedLoadURLCallback:(NSString *)url results:(id)_results {
00147   if (isDeferred(_results))
00148     return [_results addBoth:curryTS((id)self, @selector(_cachedLoadURLCallback:results:), url)];
00149   
00150   if (_results == [NSNull null]) {
00151     return [[DKDeferredURLConnection loadURL:url] 
00152             addBoth:curryTS((id)self, @selector(_cachedLoadURLCallback:results:), url)];
00153   } else {
00154     [[DKDeferredCache sharedCache] setValue:_results forKey:url timeout:7200.0f];
00155     return _results;
00156   }
00157   return nil;
00158 }

00183 + (id)gatherResults:(NSArray *)list_ {
00184   DKDeferredList *d = 
00185   [[DKDeferredList alloc]
00186    initWithList:list_
00187    withCanceller:nil
00188    fireOnOneCallback:NO
00189    fireOnOneErrback:YES
00190    consumeErrors:NO];
00191   [d addCallback:callbackP(_gatherResultsCallback)];
00192   return d;

00195 - (id)initWithCanceller:(id<DKCallback>)cancellerFunc {
00196   if ((self = [super init])) {
00197     chain = [[NSMutableArray arrayWithCapacity:3] retain];
00198     deferredID = [_uuid1() retain];
00199     fired = -1;
00200     paused = 0;
00201     started = [[NSDate date] retain];
00202     results = [[NSMutableArray arrayWithObjects:[NSNull null], [NSNull null], nil] retain];
00203     silentlyCancelled = NO;
00204     chained = NO;
00205     finalized = NO;
00206     canceller = [cancellerFunc retain];
00207     finalizer = nil;
00208   }
00209   return self;
00210 }
00211 
00212 - (void)dealloc {
00213   [chain release];
00214   [results release];
00215   [finalizer release];
00216   [canceller release];
00217   [started release];
00218   [super dealloc];
00219 }

00222 - (NSString *)description {
00223   return [NSString stringWithFormat:@"<DKDeferred id=%@ state=%i>", 
00224           deferredID, fired];

00226 
00227 - (id)pause {
00228   paused += 1;
00229   return self;
00230 }
00231 
00232 - (void)resume {
00233   if (paused >= 0)
00234     paused -= 1;
00235   if (paused)
00236     return;
00237   if (fired >= 0)
00238     [self _fire];
00239 }
00240 
00241 - (void)cancel {
00242   if (fired == -1) {
00243     if (canceller) {
00244       [canceller :self];
00245     } else {
00246       silentlyCancelled = YES;
00247     }
00248     if (fired == -1) {
00249       [self errback:
00250        [NSError
00251         errorWithDomain:DKDeferredErrorDomain
00252         code:DKDeferredCanceledError 
00253         userInfo:dict_(self, DKDeferredDeferredKey)]];
00254     }
00255   } else if ((fired == 0) && 
00256              ([[results objectAtIndex:fired] 
00257                isKindOfClass:[self class]])) {
00258     [[results objectAtIndex:fired] cancel];
00259   }
00260 }
00261 
00262 - (void)_resback:(id)result {
00263   fired = ([result isKindOfClass:[NSError class]] ? 1 : 0);
00264   [results replaceObjectAtIndex:fired withObject:
00265    (result == nil ? [NSNull null] : result)];
00266   if (paused == 0) {
00267 //    started = [[NSDate date] retain];
00268     [self _fire];
00269   }
00270 }
00271 
00272 - (void)_check {
00273   if (fired != -1) {
00274     if (!silentlyCancelled) {
00275       @throw [NSException 
00276               exceptionWithName:@"AlreadyCalledError"
00277               reason:@"Callback or errback can only happen if "
00278                      @"Deferred has not already fired." 
00279               userInfo:dict_(self, DKDeferredDeferredKey)];
00280     }
00281     silentlyCancelled = NO;
00282   }
00283 }
00284 
00285 - (void)callback:(id)result {
00286   [self _check];
00287   if ([result isKindOfClass:[self class]])
00288     @throw __CHAINED_DEFERRED_RESULT_ERROR;
00289   [self _resback:result];
00290 }
00291 
00292 - (void)errback:(id)result {
00293   [self _check];
00294   if ([result isKindOfClass:[self class]])
00295     @throw __CHAINED_DEFERRED_RESULT_ERROR;
00296   if (![result isKindOfClass:[NSError class]])
00297     result = [NSError 
00298               errorWithDomain:DKDeferredErrorDomain
00299               code:DKDeferredGenericError
00300               userInfo:dict_(self, DKDeferredResultKey)];
00301   [self _resback:result];
00302 }
00303 
00304 - (id)addBoth:(id<DKCallback>)fn {
00305   return [self addCallbacks:fn :fn];
00306 }
00307 
00308 - (id)addCallback:(id<DKCallback>)fn {
00309   return [self addCallbacks:fn :nil];
00310 }
00311 
00312 - (id)addErrback:(id<DKCallback>)fn {
00313   return [self addCallbacks:nil :fn];
00314 }
00315 
00316 - (id)addCallbacks:(id<DKCallback>)cb :(id<DKCallback>)eb {
00317   if (chained)
00318     @throw __CHAINED_DEFERRED_REUSE_ERROR;
00319   if (finalized)
00320     @throw __FINALIZED_DEFERRED_REUSE_ERROR;
00321   [chain addObject:array_(
00322     (cb == nil) ? [NSNull null] : (id)cb,
00323     (eb == nil) ? [NSNull null] : (id)eb)];
00324   if (fired >= 0)
00325     [self _fire];
00326   return self;
00327 }
00328 
00329 - (void)setFinalizer:(id<DKCallback>)fn {
00330   if (chained)
00331     @throw __CHAINED_DEFERRED_REUSE_ERROR;
00332   if (finalized)
00333     @throw __FINALIZED_DEFERRED_REUSE_ERROR;
00334   finalizer = [fn retain];
00335   if (fired >= 0)
00336     [self _fire];
00337 }
00338 
00339 - (id)_continueChain:(id)result {
00340   paused -= 1;
00341   [self _resback:result];
00342   return nil;
00343 }
00344 
00345 - (void)_fire {
00346   id<DKCallback> cb = nil;
00347   int _fired = fired;
00348   id result = [[[results objectAtIndex:_fired] retain] autorelease];
00349   while ([chain count] > 0 && paused == 0) {
00350     NSArray *pair = [[[chain objectAtIndex:0] retain] autorelease];
00351     [chain removeObjectAtIndex:0];
00352     id f = [[[pair objectAtIndex:_fired] retain] autorelease];
00353     if (f == [NSNull null])
00354       continue;
00355     id newResult = [(id<DKCallback>)f :result];
00356     result = (newResult == nil) ? [NSNull null] : newResult;
00357     _fired = [result isKindOfClass:[NSError class]] ? 1 : 0;
00358     if ([result isKindOfClass:[self class]]) {
00359       cb = callbackTS(self, _continueChain:);
00360       paused += 1;
00361     }
00362   }
00363   fired = _fired;
00364   [results replaceObjectAtIndex:fired withObject:result];
00365   if ([chain count] == 0 && paused == 0 && !(finalizer == nil)) {
00366     finalized = YES;
00367     [finalizer :result];
00368   }
00369   if (! (cb == nil) && paused) {
00370     [result addBoth:cb];
00371     [result setChained:YES];
00372   }
00373 }
00374 
00375 - (NSComparisonResult)compare:(DKDeferred *)otherDeferred {
00376   return [self.deferredID compare:otherDeferred.deferredID];
00377 }

00379 - (NSComparisonResult)compareDates:(DKDeferred *)otherDeferred {
00380   return [self.started compare:otherDeferred.started];
00381 }

00393           withCanceller:nil
00394           fireOnOneCallback:NO 
00395           fireOnOneErrback:NO
00396           consumeErrors:NO];

00399 + (id)deferredList:(NSArray *)list_ withCanceller:(id<DKCallback>)cancelf {
00400   return [[[self class] alloc]
00401           initWithList:list_
00402           withCanceller:cancelf
00403           fireOnOneCallback:NO
00404           fireOnOneErrback:NO
00405           consumeErrors:NO];
00406 }
00407 
00408 - (id)initWithList:(NSArray *)list_
00409      withCanceller:(id<DKCallback>)cancelf
00410  fireOnOneCallback:(BOOL)fireoc
00411   fireOnOneErrback:(BOOL)fireoe
00412      consumeErrors:(BOOL)consume {
00413   if ((self = [super initWithCanceller:cancelf])) {
00414     list = [list_ retain];
00415     resultList = [[NSMutableArray array] retain];
00416     finishedCount = 0;
00417     self.fireOnOneCallback = fireoc;
00418     self.fireOnOneErrback = fireoe;
00419     self.consumeErrors = consume;
00420     
00421     for (int i = 0; i < [list count]; i++) {
00422       DKDeferred *d = [list objectAtIndex:i];
00423       [resultList addObject:[NSNull null]];
00424       NSNumber *I = [NSNumber numberWithInt:i];
00425       NSNumber *Y = [NSNumber numberWithInt:YES];
00426       NSNumber *N = [NSNumber numberWithInt:NO];
00427       [d addCallback:curryTS(self, @selector(_cbDeferred:succeeded:result:), I, Y)];
00428       [d addErrback:curryTS(self, @selector(_cbDeferred:succeeded:result:), I, N)];
00429     }
00430     
00431     if ([list count] == 0 && !fireOnOneCallback)
00432       [self callback:resultList];
00433   }
00434   
00435   return self;
00436 }
00437 
00438 - (void)dealloc {
00439   [list release];
00440   [resultList release];
00441   [super dealloc];
00442 }
00443 
00444 - (id)_cbDeferred:(id)index succeeded:(id)succeeded result:(id)result {
00445   int _index = [(NSNumber *)index intValue];
00446   BOOL _succeeded = [(NSNumber *)succeeded boolValue];
00447   result = (result == nil) ? [NSNull null] : result;
00448   [resultList 
00449    replaceObjectAtIndex:_index 
00450    withObject:array_(succeeded, result)];
00451   finishedCount += 1;
00452   if (fired == -1) {
00453     if (_succeeded && fireOnOneCallback)
00454       [self callback:array_(index, result)];
00455     else if (!_succeeded && fireOnOneErrback)
00456       [self errback:result];
00457     else if (finishedCount == [list count])
00458       [self callback:[NSArray arrayWithArray:resultList]];
00459   }
00460   if (!_succeeded && consumeErrors)
00461     result = nil;
00462   return result;
00463 }

00472 - (id)initWithDeferred:(DKDeferred *)deferred {

00474     d = [[deferred addBoth:callbackTS(self, _get:)] retain];
00475   }

00478 
00479 - (id)result {
00480   if (!result) {
00481     running = YES;
00482   }
00483   while (running) {
00484     [[NSRunLoop currentRunLoop] runUntilDate:[NSDate dateWithTimeIntervalSinceNow:0.01]];
00485   }
00486   return result;
00487 }
00488 
00489 - (id)_get:(id)_result {
00490   if (isDeferred(_result)) {
00491     [d release];
00492     d = [[_result addBoth:callbackTS(self, _get:)] retain];
00493     return d;
00494   }
00495   running = NO;
00496   self.result = _result;
00497   return _result;
00498 }
00499 
00500 - (void)dealloc {
00501   [d release];
00502   [result release];
00503   [super dealloc];
00504 }

00548 - (id)initWithFunction:(id<DKCallback>)func 
00549             withObject:(id)arg
00550              canceller:(id<DKCallback>)cancelf
00551                 paused:(BOOL)_paused {
00552   if ((self = [super initWithCanceller:cancelf])) {
00553     action = [func retain];
00554     thread = [[[NSThread alloc] 
00555                initWithTarget:self
00556                selector:@selector(_cbThreadedDeferred:)
00557                object:arg] retain];
00558     parentThread = [[NSThread currentThread] retain];
00559     if (!_paused) {
00560       [thread start];
00561     } else {
00562       return [[DKDeferred deferred] addCallback:callbackTS(self, _cbStartThread:)];
00563     }
00564   }
00565   return self;
00566 }
00567 
00568 - (id)_cbStartThread:(id)arg {
00569   [thread start];
00570   return self;
00571 }
00572 
00573 - (void)dealloc {
00574   [action release];
00575   [thread release];
00576   [parentThread release];
00577   [super dealloc];
00578 }
00579 
00580 - (void)_cbThreadedDeferred:(id)arg {
00581   NSAutoreleasePool *pool = [[NSAutoreleasePool alloc] init];
00582   id result;
00583   result = [action :arg];
00584   [self performSelector:@selector(_cbReturnFromThread:) 
00585                onThread:parentThread
00586              withObject:result
00587           waitUntilDone:NO];
00588   [pool drain];
00589 }
00590 
00591 - (void)_cbReturnFromThread:(id)result {
00592   if ([result isKindOfClass:[NSError class]])
00593     [self errback:result];
00594   else if ([result isKindOfClass:[DKDeferred class]])
00595     @throw __CHAINED_DEFERRED_RESULT_ERROR;
00596   else
00597     [self callback:result];
00598 }

00615 - (id)initWithFunction:(id<DKCallback>)func 
00616             withObject:(id)_arg
00617              canceller:(id<DKCallback>)cancelf
00618                 paused:(BOOL)startPaused {
00619   if ((self = [super initWithCanceller:cancelf])) {
00620     action = [func retain];
00621     parentThread = [[NSThread currentThread] retain];
00622     op = [[[NSInvocationOperation alloc] 
00623           initWithTarget:self
00624           selector:@selector(_cbOperation:)
00625            object:_arg] retain];
00626   }
00627   return self;
00628 }
00629 
00630 - (id)_cbStartOperation:(id)_arg {
00631   [op start];
00632   return self;
00633 }
00634 
00635 - (void)_cbOperation:(id)_arg {
00636   id result = [[[action :_arg] retain] autorelease];
00637   [self performSelector:@selector(_cbReturnFromOp:)
00638                onThread:parentThread
00639              withObject:result
00640           waitUntilDone:NO];
00641 }
00642 
00643 - (void)_cbReturnFromOp:(id)result {
00644   if ([result isKindOfClass:[NSError class]])
00645     [self errback:result];
00646   else if ([result isKindOfClass:[DKDeferred class]])
00647     @throw __CHAINED_DEFERRED_RESULT_ERROR;
00648   else
00649     [self callback:result];
00650 }

00681 - (id)initWithURL:(NSString *)aUrl paused:(BOOL)_paused {
00682   return [self initRequest:
00683             [NSURLRequest requestWithURL:[NSURL URLWithString:aUrl]
00684                              cachePolicy:NSURLRequestReloadIgnoringCacheData
00685                          timeoutInterval:15.0f]
00686             decodeFunction:nil paused:_paused];

00689 - (id)initWithURL:(NSString *)aUrl pauseFor:(NSTimeInterval)pause {
00690   return [self initWithRequest:
00691           [NSURLRequest requestWithURL:[NSURL URLWithString:aUrl]
00692                            cachePolicy:NSURLRequestReloadIgnoringCacheData 
00693                        timeoutInterval:15.0f]
00694                       pauseFor:0.0f
00695                 decodeFunction:nil];
00696 }
00697 
00698 - (id)initRequest:(NSURLRequest *)req 
00699    decodeFunction:(id<DKCallback>)decodeF
00700            paused:(BOOL)_paused {
00701   if ((self = [super initWithCanceller:nil])) {
00702     if (!__urlConnectionCount) {
00703       __urlConnectionCount = 0;
00704     }
00705     refreshFrequency = 1.0f;
00706     expectedContentLength = 0L;
00707     percentComplete = 0.0f;
00708     progressCallback = nil;
00709     url = [[req URL] retain];
00710     _data = [[NSMutableData data] retain];
00711     [_data setLength:0];
00712     request = [req retain];
00713     decodeFunction = [decodeF retain];
00714     if (_paused) {
00715       return [[DKDeferred deferred] addCallback:callbackTS(self, _cbStartLoading:)];
00716     } else {
00717       [self _cbStartLoading:nil];
00718     }
00719   }
00720   return self;
00721 }
00722 
00723 - (id)initWithRequest:(NSURLRequest *)req pauseFor:(NSTimeInterval)pause
00724        decodeFunction:(id<DKCallback>)decodeF {
00725   if ((self = [super initWithCanceller:nil])) {
00726     // init __urlConnetionCount
00727     if (!__urlConnectionCount) {
00728       __urlConnectionCount = 0;
00729     }
00730     refreshFrequency = 1.0f;
00731     expectedContentLength = 0L;
00732     percentComplete = 0.0f;
00733     progressCallback = nil;
00734     url = [[req URL] retain];
00735     _data = [[NSMutableData data] retain];
00736     [_data setLength:0];
00737     request = [req retain];
00738     decodeFunction = [decodeF retain];
00739     if (pause > 0) {
00740       [DKDeferred callLater:pause func:callbackTS(self, _cbStartLoading:)];
00741     } else {
00742       connection = [[NSURLConnection 
00743                      connectionWithRequest:request
00744                      delegate:self] retain];
00745       __urlConnectionCount += 1;
00746       NSLog(@"loading %@ : %@", self.started, url);
00747       if (!connection) {
00748         __urlConnectionCount -= 1;
00749         NSLog(@"error:???");
00750         [self errback:
00751          [NSError
00752           errorWithDomain:DKDeferredURLErrorDomain 
00753           code:DKDeferredURLError 
00754           userInfo:EMPTY_DICT]];
00755       }
00756     }
00757   }
00758   return self;
00759 }

00761 - (void)setProgressCallback:(id<DKCallback>)callback {
00762   if (progressCallback) {
00763     [progressCallback release];
00764     progressCallback = nil;
00765   }
00766   progressCallback = [callback retain];
00767 }

00769 - (void)setProgressCallback:(id<DKCallback>)callback 
00770               withFrequency:(NSTimeInterval)frequency {
00771   refreshFrequency = frequency;
00772   if (progressCallback) {
00773     [progressCallback release];
00774     progressCallback = nil;
00775   }
00776   progressCallback = [callback retain];
00777 }

00782 //  NSLog(@" - didreceiveresponse - %@", [(NSHTTPURLResponse *)response allHeaderFields]);
00783   percentComplete = 0.0f;
00784   [_data setLength:0];
00785   [self _cbProgressUpdate];
00786 }

00791   [self _cbProgressUpdate];

00794 - (void)connection:(NSURLConnection *)aConnection
00795   didFailWithError:(NSError *)error {
00796   [aConnection release];
00797   NSLog(@"didFailWithError:%@", error);
00798   [self _cbProgressUpdate];
00799   [self errback:error];
00800   __urlConnectionCount -= 1;
00801 }
00802 
00803 - (void)connectionDidFinishLoading:(NSURLConnection *)aConnection {
00804   id ret = nil;
00805   if (! (decodeFunction == nil)) {
00806     ret = [decodeFunction :_data];
00807   }
00808   if (progressCallback)
00809     [self _cbProgressUpdate];
00810   __urlConnectionCount -= 1;
00811   [self callback:(ret == nil) ? [NSData dataWithData:_data] : ret];
00812 //  [aConnection release];
00813 }
00814 
00815 - (void)_cbProgressUpdate {
00816   percentComplete = (double)[_data length] / (double)expectedContentLength;
00817 //  NSLog(@"_data:%i expectedContentLength:%i", [_data length], expectedContentLength);
00818 //  NSLog(@"percentComplete:%d", percentComplete);
00819   if (progressCallback) {
00820     [progressCallback :[NSNumber numberWithDouble:percentComplete]];
00821   }
00822 }

00841 - (id)_cbStartLoading:(id)result {
00842   NSLog(@"connection: %@ : %@", self.started, url);
00843   connection = [[NSURLConnection connectionWithRequest:request delegate:self] retain];
00844   if (connection) {
00845     __urlConnectionCount += 1;
00846   } else {
00847     NSLog(@"nsurlconnection error: connection could not be initialized");
00848     [self errback:[NSError
00849       errorWithDomain:DKDeferredURLErrorDomain 
00850       code:DKDeferredURLError userInfo:EMPTY_DICT]];
00851   }
00852   return self;
00853 }

00893 - (BOOL)hasKey:(NSString *)key {

00898 // TODO: convert to use NSUserDefaults....
00899 - (id)incr:(NSString *)key delta:(int)delta { // synchronous
00900   NSNumber *val = nil;
00901   if (![self hasKey:key] || !(val = [self _getValue:key])) {
00902     return [NSError errorWithDomain:DKDeferredErrorDomain 
00903                                code:9903 userInfo:EMPTY_DICT];
00904   }
00905   NSNumber *newVal = [NSNumber numberWithInt:[val intValue] + delta];
00906   [self _setValue:newVal forKey:key timeout:[NSNumber numberWithInt:0] arg:nil];
00907   return newVal;
00908 }
00909 
00910 // TODO: convert to use NSUserDefaults....
00911 - (id)decr:(NSString *)key delta:(int)delta { // synchronous
00912   return [self incr:key delta:-delta];
00913 }
00914 
00915 // should always be executed in a thread
00916 - (id)_getManyValues:(NSArray *)keys {
00917   NSMutableArray *ret = [NSMutableArray arrayWithCapacity:[keys count]];
00918   NSObject *val = nil;
00919   for (NSString *key in keys) {
00920     val = [self _getValue:key];
00921     [ret addObject:((val == nil) ? [NSNull null] : val)];
00922   }
00923   return [NSDictionary dictionaryWithObjects:ret forKeys:keys];
00924 }
00925 
00926 // should always be executed in a thread
00927 - (id)_getValue:(NSString *)key { 
00928   NSString *fname = [dir stringByAppendingPathComponent:md5(key)];
00929   NSFileManager *fm = [NSFileManager defaultManager];
00930   if ([fm fileExistsAtPath:fname]) {
00931     NSArray *content = [NSKeyedUnarchiver unarchiveObjectWithFile:fname];
00932     NSDate *expires = (NSDate *)[content objectAtIndex:0];
00933     if (([expires compare:[NSDate date]] == NSOrderedAscending)) {
00934       [fm removeItemAtPath:fname error:nil];
00935       return nil;
00936     } else {
00937       return [content objectAtIndex:1];
00938     }
00939   }
00940   return nil;
00941 }
00942 
00943 // should always be executed in a thread
00944 - (id)_setValue:(NSObject *)value forKey:(NSString *)key 
00945         timeout:(NSNumber *)timeout arg:(id)arg {
00946   if (![[value class] canBeStoredInCache]) {
00947     return nil;
00948   }
00949   NSString *fname = [dir stringByAppendingPathComponent:md5(key)];
00950   [self _cull];
00951   NSArray *content = array_([NSDate dateWithTimeIntervalSinceNow:[timeout intValue]], value);
00952   [NSKeyedArchiver archiveRootObject:content toFile:fname];
00953   return nil;
00954 }
00955 
00956 + (id)sharedCache {
00957   if (!__sharedCache) {
00958     __sharedCache = [[DKDeferredCache alloc] 
00959                      initWithDirectory:@"_dksc"
00960                      maxEntries:300
00961                      cullFrequency:3];
00962   }
00963   return __sharedCache;
00964 }
00965 
00966 - (id)initWithDirectory:(NSString *)_dir 
00967              maxEntries:(int)_maxEntries
00968           cullFrequency:(int)_cullFrequency {
00969   if ((self = [super init])) {
00970     maxEntries = (_maxEntries < 1) ? 300 : _maxEntries;
00971     cullFrequency = (_cullFrequency < 1) ? 3 : _cullFrequency;
00972     operationQueue = [[NSOperationQueue alloc] init];
00973     // init cache directory
00974     NSFileManager *fm = [NSFileManager defaultManager];
00975     NSArray *paths = NSSearchPathForDirectoriesInDomains(NSCachesDirectory, NSUserDirectory, YES);
00976     NSString *cachesPath = [paths objectAtIndex:0];
00977     dir = [[cachesPath stringByAppendingPathComponent:_dir] retain];
00978     if (![fm fileExistsAtPath:cachesPath]) {
00979       [fm createDirectoryAtPath:cachesPath attributes:nil];
00980     }
00981     if (![fm fileExistsAtPath:dir]) {
00982       [fm createDirectoryAtPath:dir attributes:nil];
00983     }
00984   }
00985   return self;
00986 }
00987 
00988 - (void)dealloc {
00989   [operationQueue release];
00990   [dir release];
00991   [super dealloc];
00992 }
00993 
00994 - (void)_cull {
00995   if ([self _getNumEntries] > maxEntries) {
00996     NSFileManager *fm = [NSFileManager defaultManager];
00997     NSArray *fileList = [fm directoryContentsAtPath:dir];
00998     NSMutableArray *doomed = [NSMutableArray array];
00999     int count = 0;
01000     for (NSString *path in fileList) {
01001       if ((count % cullFrequency) == 0) {
01002         [doomed addObject:path];
01003       }
01004       count += 1;
01005     }
01006     for (NSString *dead in doomed) {
01007       [fm removeItemAtPath:[dir stringByAppendingPathComponent:dead] error:nil];
01008 //      NSLog(@"##DKCache removeItem: %@", dead);
01009     }
01010   }
01011 }
01012 
01013 - (int)_getNumEntries {
01014   NSArray *fileNames = [[NSFileManager defaultManager]
01015                         directoryContentsAtPath:dir];
01016   if (!fileNames)
01017     return 0;
01018   return [fileNames count];
01019 }

01024 @implementation DKMappedPriorityQueue

01026 - (id)init {
01027   if ((self = [super init])) {
01028     _queueKeys = [[NSMutableDictionary alloc] init];
01029     _queue = [[NSMutableArray alloc] init];
01030   }
01031   return self;
01032 }

01034 - (void)dealloc {
01035   [_queueKeys release];
01036   [_queue release];
01037   [super dealloc];
01038 }
01039 
01040 - (id)objForKey:(id)key {
01041   return [[_queueKeys objectForKey:key]
01042           objectAtIndex:1];
01043 }
01044 
01045 - (SEL)selForKey:(id)key {
01046   SEL ret;
01047   id obj =[[_queueKeys objectForKey:key] objectAtIndex:0];
01048   if (obj) {
01049     [obj getValue:&ret];
01050     return ret;
01051   }
01052   return nil;
01053 }
01054 
01055 - (int)count {
01056   return [_queue count];
01057 }
01058 
01059 - (id)enqueue:(id)obj key:(id)key {
01060   return [self enqueue:obj key:key prioritySelector:nil];
01061 }
01062 
01063 - (id)enqueue:(id)obj key:(id)key prioritySelector:(SEL)prioritySel {
01064   if (prioritySel == nil) {
01065     prioritySel = @selector(compare:);
01066   }
01067   NSArray *existing = [_queueKeys objectForKey:key];
01068   if (existing && [existing count]) {
01069     return nil;
01070   }
01071   [_queue addObject:key];
01072   [_queueKeys setObject:
01073    array_([NSValue valueWithBytes:&prioritySel objCType:@encode(SEL)], obj)
01074                  forKey:key];
01075   [self _siftDown:0 :[_queue count] - 1];
01076   return obj;
01077 }
01078 
01079 - (id)dequeue {
01080   id key;
01081   id keyE;
01082   id obj;
01083   int size = [_queue count];
01084   if (!size) {
01085     return nil;
01086   }
01087   keyE = [[[_queue objectAtIndex:(size - 1)] retain] autorelease];
01088   [_queue removeLastObject];
01089   if ([_queue count]) {
01090     key = [[[_queue objectAtIndex:0] retain] autorelease];
01091     [_queue replaceObjectAtIndex:0 withObject:keyE];
01092     [self _siftUp:0];
01093   } else {
01094     key = keyE;
01095   }
01096   obj = [[[self objForKey:key] retain] autorelease];
01097   [_queueKeys removeObjectForKey:key];
01098   return array_(obj, key);
01099 }
01100 
01101 - (id)peek {
01102   if (![_queue count]) {
01103     return nil;
01104   }
01105   return [_queue objectAtIndex:0];
01106 }
01107 
01108 - (NSArray *)allValues {
01109   NSMutableArray *ret = [NSMutableArray array];
01110   for (id k in _queue) {
01111     [ret addObject:[self objForKey:k]];
01112   }
01113   return ret;
01114 }
01115 
01116 - (NSArray *)allKeys {
01117   return [NSArray arrayWithArray:_queue];
01118 }
01119 
01120 - (NSComparisonResult)compareKeys:(id)leftKey :(id)rightKey {
01121   return ((NSComparisonResult)
01122     [[self objForKey:leftKey]
01123       performSelector:[self selForKey:leftKey]
01124       withObject:[self objForKey:rightKey]]);
01125 }
01126 
01127 - (void)_siftDown:(int)startPos :(int)pos {
01128   int parentPos;
01129   id parent;
01130   id newItem = [_queue objectAtIndex:pos];
01131   while (pos > startPos) {
01132     parentPos = (pos - 1) >> 1;
01133     parent = [_queue objectAtIndex:parentPos];
01134     if ([self compareKeys:newItem :parent] == NSOrderedAscending) {
01135       [_queue replaceObjectAtIndex:pos withObject:parent];
01136       pos = parentPos;
01137       continue;
01138     }
01139     break;
01140   }
01141   [_queue replaceObjectAtIndex:pos withObject:newItem];
01142 }
01143 
01144 - (void)_siftUp:(int)pos {
01145   int rightPos;
01146   int endPos = [_queue count];
01147   int startPos = pos;
01148   id newItem = [_queue objectAtIndex:pos];
01149   int childPos = 2 * pos + 1;
01150   while (childPos < endPos) {
01151     rightPos = childPos + 1;
01152     if (rightPos < endPos && 
01153         !([self compareKeys:[_queue objectAtIndex:childPos] 
01154                            :[_queue objectAtIndex:rightPos]] 
01155           == NSOrderedAscending)) {
01156       childPos = rightPos;
01157     }
01158     [_queue replaceObjectAtIndex:pos withObject:[_queue objectAtIndex:childPos]];
01159     pos = childPos;
01160     childPos = 2 * pos + 1;
01161   }
01162   [_queue replaceObjectAtIndex:pos withObject:newItem];
01163   [self _siftDown:startPos :pos];
01164 }
01165

01169 @implementation DKDeferredPool

01171 + (id)pool {
01172   return [[[self class] init] autorelease];
01173 }
01174 
01175 - (id)init {
01176   if ((self = [super init])) {
01177     _queue = [[[DKMappedPriorityQueue alloc] init] retain];
01178     _runningDeferreds = [[[NSMutableDictionary alloc] init] retain];
01179     concurrency = 10;
01180     timeout = 10.0;
01181     wLock = [[[NSLock alloc] init] retain];
01182   }
01183   return self;
01184 }
01185 
01186 - (void)setFinalizeFunc:(id<DKCallback>)f {
01187   finalizeFunc = [f retain];
01188 }
01189 
01190 - (void)_checkFinalization {
01191   if (finalizeFunc && ![_queue count] && ![_runningDeferreds count]) {
01192     [finalizeFunc :self];
01193   }
01194 }
01195 
01196 - (id)add:(DKDeferred *)d key:(id)k {
01197   id ret;
01198   [wLock lock];
01199   ret = [_queue enqueue:d key:k prioritySelector:@selector(compareDates:)];
01200   [wLock unlock];
01201   if (ret) {
01202     [d addBoth:curryTS(self, @selector(_cbRemoveDeferred::), k)];
01203   } else {
01204     ret = d;
01205     [ret cancel];
01206   }
01207   [self _resumeWaiting];
01208   return ret;
01209 }
01210 
01217 - (id)_cbRemoveDeferred:(id)key :(id)results {
01218   if (isDeferred(results)) {
01219     [wLock lock];
01220     [_runningDeferreds setObject:results forKey:key];
01221     [wLock unlock];
01222     return [results addBoth:curryTS(self, @selector(_cbRemoveDeferred::), key)];
01223   }
01224   [wLock lock];
01225   [_runningDeferreds removeObjectForKey:key];
01226   [wLock unlock];
01227   [self _resumeWaiting];
01228   return results;
01229 }
01230 
01231 - (void)_resumeWaiting {
01232   NSArray *item;
01233   NSMutableArray *resumables = [NSMutableArray array];
01234   [wLock lock];
01235   while ([_runningDeferreds count] < concurrency) {
01236     item = [_queue dequeue];
01237     if (!item || ![item count]) {
01238       break;
01239     }
01240     [[item retain] autorelease];
01241     [resumables addObject:item];
01242     [_runningDeferreds setObject:[item objectAtIndex:0]
01243                           forKey:[item objectAtIndex:1]];
01244   }
01245   [self _checkFinalization];
01246   [wLock unlock]; // a callback can return in the same thread and invoke _resumeWaiting here
01247   for (item in resumables) {
01248     [[item objectAtIndex:0] callback:nil];
01249   }
01250 }
01251 
01252 - (void)drain {
01253   [[_runningDeferreds allValues] makeObjectsPerformSelector:@selector(cancel)];
01254   id obj;
01255   while ((obj = [_queue dequeue])) {
01256     if ([obj count]) {
01257       [[obj objectAtIndex:0] cancel];
01258     }
01259   }
01260 }
01261 
01262 - (void)setConcurrency:(int)numConcurrentDeferreds {
01263   @synchronized(self) {
01264     concurrency = numConcurrentDeferreds;
01265   }
01266 }
01267 
01268 - (int)concurrency {
01269   int c;
01270   @synchronized(self) {
01271     c = concurrency;
01272   }
01273   return c;
01274 }
01275 
01276 - (void)setTimeout:(double)concurrentDeferredTimeout {
01277   @synchronized(self) {
01278     timeout = concurrentDeferredTimeout;
01279   }
01280 }
01281 
01282 - (double)timeout {
01283   int t;
01284   @synchronized(self) {
01285     t = timeout;
01286   }
01287   return t;
01288 }
01289 
01290 - (void)dealloc {
01291   [finalizeFunc release];
01292   [wLock release];
01293   [_runningDeferreds release];
01294   [_queue release];
01295   [super dealloc];
01296 }
